attributes.action: change the licencing conditons relating to  monoclonal antibody drugs, such as Cetuximab, which have been shown to be effective in cancer treatment, to make these drugs readily available on the NHS and, in the meantime, to allow cancer patients to pay for these drugs  whilst still receiving the rest of their treatment on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These drugs offer longer life expectancy & a better quality of life to cancer patients. They are not readily available on the NHS and where patients have offered to top up their treatment by paying for these drugs they have been refused further NHS treatment & are expected to pay for all drugs etc (see Sunday Times 01/06/08) The PM pledged to improve cancer treatment - this is the way to do it & raise our standards of care nearer to the rest of Europe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
